category.name: Audit Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_audit_disabled_dataset_types
preference.preference_description: (Deprecated) This is deprecated in Teamcenter 12.2 and will be removed after Teamcenter 14. Use conditional auditing feature by configuring BMIDE condition on ImanFile audit definition to control auditing file events. Refer sample BMIDE condition Fnd0FileAuditCondition. Specifies the list of Dataset types that should not be audited for ImanFile::_Read_File event.
